mapper.sql: CONF_ID, NAME, BEGIN_TIME, DURATION, ACCESS_CODE, RECORDER_ADDR, IS_RECORDING, CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD, MAIN_MCU_ID, SITES, TYPE, CREATE_NAME, STATUS, USER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE (CONF_ID, NAME, BEGIN_TIME, DURATION, ACCESS_CODE, RECORDER_ADDR, IS_RECORDING, CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD, MAIN_MCU_ID, SITES, TYPE, CREATE_NAME, STATUS, USER_ID) values (#{confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recorderAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRecording,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chairmanPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainMcuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sites,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE
CONF_ID = #{record.confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DURATION = #{record.duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESS_CODE = #{record.accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDER_ADDR = #{record.recorderAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RECORDING = #{record.isRecording,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD = #{record.chairmanPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_MCU_ID = #{record.mainMcuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SITES = #{record.sites,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_NAME = #{record.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE set CONF_ID = #{record.confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DURATION = #{record.duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESS_CODE = #{record.accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORDER_ADDR = #{record.recorderAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_RECORDING = #{record.isRecording,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD = #{record.chairmanPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_MCU_ID = #{record.mainMcuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SITES = #{record.sites,jdbcType=CLOB}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_NAME = #{record.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESS_CODE = #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDER_ADDR = #{recorderAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RECORDING = #{isRecording,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD = #{chairmanPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_MCU_ID = #{mainMcuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SITES = #{sites,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CONF_ID = #{confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESS_CODE = #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORDER_ADDR = #{recorderAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_RECORDING = #{isRecording,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHAIRMAN_PASSWORD = #{chairmanPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_MCU_ID = #{mainMcuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SITES = #{sites,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONF_ID = #{confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count,a.code,a.name from (select count(1) as count ,substr(t.USER_ID,0,3) as code from T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE t where t.type=1 and TO_CHAR(t.BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy')=#{start} GROUP BY substr(t.USER_ID,0,3))f
RIGHT JOIN area a on a.code=f.code where a.PARENT_ID=0

select count,a.code,a.name from (select count(1) as count ,substr(t.USER_ID,0,6) as code from T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE t where t.type=1 and TO_CHAR(t.BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy')=#{start} GROUP BY substr(t.USER_ID,0,6))f
RIGHT JOIN area a on a.code=f.code where a.ALEVEL='1' and a.code like '${code}%'

select count,current_month from (select count(1) as count,T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH as oldMonth from T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE t RIGHT JOIN T_TIME on T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=TO_CHAR(t.BEGIN_TIME,'MM') where t.TYPE=1 and TO_CHAR(t.BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy')=#{start} and t.user_id like '${code}%' GROUP BY T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH)confer
RIGHT JOIN T_TIME on T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=confer.oldMonth ORDER BY current_month asc
